00014 clException::clException(void)
00015 {
00016   strcpy(className, "Unknown");
00017   strcpy(methodName, "Unknown");
00018   strcpy(errorMessage, "None");
00019 }
00020 
00021 clException::clException(const char *clName, const char *mtName, const char *mes)
00022 {
00023   strcpy(className, clName);
00024   strcpy(methodName, mtName);
00025   strcpy(errorMessage, mes);
00026 }

00028 void clException::PrintError(void) const
00029 {
00030   cerr << endl;
00031   cerr << "**************************************************" << endl;
00032   cerr << "ERROR" << endl;
00033   cerr << "  CLASS  : " << className << endl;
00034   cerr << "  METHOD : " << methodName << endl;
00035   cerr << "  MESSAGE: " << errorMessage << endl;
00036   cerr << "**************************************************" << endl;
00037   cerr << endl;
